pages.text: Beekeeping has been practiced for millennia seeking to obtain the products the bees produce: honey, which has magical properties, and honeycombs, which can be processed for wax.

In order to delve into beekeeping, a witch should first hunt down a $(l:exploration/beehive)beehive$(), in order to obtain an empty honeycomb.$(p)Secondly, such honeycomb should then be used to craft an apiary.$(br2)For the apiary to work, another $(item)empty comb, some
$(item)paper or carpets$() should be inserted into the apiary. $(br2)Only then will the bees produce more honeycombs or fill them with honey.
